_comment: This file is the authoritative source of truth for task execution state. The markdown plan file is read-only reference documentation. Use status-cli.js to update task status.

tasks.description: Verify plan_orchestrator.py runs correctly before changes (baseline)
Identify all imports needed by each component
Create `scripts/lib/tui.py` with file header and imports
tasks.notes: Created scripts/lib/tui.py with file header, imports (threading, time, collections, dataclasses, datetime, typing, rich)

tasks.description: Move `Activity` dataclass to tui.py
tasks.notes: Activity dataclass moved to tui.py (lines 42-48)

tasks.notes: ActivityTracker class moved to tui.py (lines 51-123)

tasks.notes: RichTUIManager class moved to tui.py (lines 130-342)

tasks.notes: Added __all__ export list with Activity, ActivityTracker, RichTUIManager, RICH_AVAILABLE

tasks.notes: Created scripts/lib/claude_runner.py with file header, module docstring, and imports (json, subprocess, time, typing)

tasks.notes: Moved StreamingClaudeRunner class to claude_runner.py (lines 19-171)

tasks.notes: Created scripts/lib/status_monitor.py with file header, module docstring, imports (json, os, threading, typing), and __all__ export list

tasks.notes: Moved StatusMonitor class to status_monitor.py (lines 23-103)

tasks.description: Remove moved classes from plan_orchestrator.py
tasks.notes: Removed Activity, ActivityTracker, StreamingClaudeRunner, StatusMonitor, and RichTUIManager classes (lines 67-743). File reduced from 1424 to 729 lines.

tasks.description: Add imports from new modules to plan_orchestrator.py
tasks.notes: Added imports: RichTUIManager, RICH_AVAILABLE from tui.py; StreamingClaudeRunner from claude_runner.py; StatusMonitor from status_monitor.py (lines 38-41)

tasks.description: Ensure `PlanStatus`, `PlanOrchestrator`, and `main()` remain in plan_orchestrator.py
tasks.notes: Verified PlanStatus (line 56), PlanOrchestrator (line 91), and main() (line 633) remain in plan_orchestrator.py

tasks.description: Update any internal references if needed
tasks.notes: Added sys.path setup for direct script execution. All internal references verified working - both direct execution (python3 scripts/plan_orchestrator.py --help) and module import work correctly.

tasks.description: Run `python3 scripts/plan_orchestrator.py --help` to verify CLI works
tasks.notes: CLI --help works correctly. Shows all expected options: --plan, --max-iterations, --timeout, --batch-size, --dry-run, --verbose, --continue, --no-tui

tasks.description: Run `python3 scripts/plan_orchestrator.py --dry-run` to verify orchestrator initializes
tasks.notes: Orchestrator initializes and runs successfully in --dry-run mode. Shows plan header, progress bars, iteration status, and completes orchestration loop. Tested with --no-tui flag to avoid terminal interaction issues.

tasks.description: Run `python3 scripts/plan_orchestrator.py --no-tui --dry-run` to verify non-TUI mode
tasks.notes: Non-TUI mode works correctly. Output includes timestamped INFO messages, ASCII progress bars, plain text iteration displays. Shows 'Next tasks' and '[DRY RUN] Would execute' messages as expected.

tasks.description: Remove any duplicate imports from plan_orchestrator.py
tasks.notes: Verified no duplicate imports in plan_orchestrator.py - all 12 imports are unique

tasks.description: Verify no unused imports in any module
tasks.notes: Verified all imports: removed unused 'List' from plan_orchestrator.py typing imports. All modules import successfully.

tasks.description: Add module docstrings to each new file
tasks.notes: Verified all new modules have docstrings: tui.py (TUI components), claude_runner.py (streaming CLI execution), status_monitor.py (background status monitoring)
